Sing

Korean: 씽

Hong Kong SAR China

Mài Jùnshēng

麥駿昇

Height:
6'1" (184 cm)
Group (2022-present):
XODIAC

Introduction

Sing is a Hong Kongese trainee under One Cool Jacso Entertainment. He is a member of the boy group XODIAC.

He was revealed as a member of the pre-debut boy group OCJ NEWBIES (later XODIAC), going by the temporary name SM, on September 28, 2022. He was formally unveiled as a member of the group on October 23, 2022, performing under the stage name Sing.

Concept photographs for Sing's pre-debut single 'Calling' were released on March 9, 2023, marking Sing's official confirmation as a member of XODIAC.

They made their debut with the digital song 'Throw A Dice' on April 25, 2023.
